name: Old Gay Cats Look at Old Photos
name_original: Old Gay Cats Look at Old Photos
description:
Submission to the Yuri Game Jam 2022!

A very heavy work in progress little Visual Novel about two Old Gay Cats [Named Romeo and Juliet] looking at Old Photos! 
I'm hoping this is at least a bit interesting despite being only like 2 minutes long so far!

Notes:

- 5 more Photos + ending to be added soon! (hopefully)

-  There is Loud Rain Audio Throughout.

Details:

- Game Length:  2-3 ~ minutes [yeah it's not much yet.]

Credits:

- Sounds Effects: https://pixabay.com/

- Font: https://opendyslexic.org/

- Art/Characters/GUI Elements/Writing: NamelessMewMew/Me
